title: Special Effects
brief_description: This thoroughly entertaining program takes the viewer on a behind the scenes look at such special effects blockbusters as “Blade Runner”, “The Right Stuff”, “The Empire Strikes Back” and “Return of the Jedi” along with examples of the latest work being done in computer generated imagery, video games and sound effects. Narrated by Robin King.
